This article has also been viewed 179,558 times.
		<a class="sp_learn_more_link" href="/wikiHow:About-wikiHow#Why_should_you_choose_wikiHow_first.3F_sub">Learn more...</a>

<p>For many countries in the world dialing <b>911, 999, or 112</b> from a mobile phone will connect you with emergency services. If that fails, this page lists mobile and landline emergency numbers for most countries on earth. Use the table of contents links to skip directly to the continent and country whose phone number you need.</p>

<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9d/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_5a28e1ad5f" onload="WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_5a28e1ad5f')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" onload="WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9d/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript>
<script>WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');</script></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Try 911 or 112.</b> These numbers work with many mobile service providers worldwide, due to efforts by the European Union and the United States. Try these first, unless a local knows a number that will work on mobile phones.

<script>WH.performance.mark('step1_rendered');</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-2-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-2-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 2" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/34/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-2-Version-2.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-2-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_3ea4549568" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_3ea4549568')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 2" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/34/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-2-Version-2.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-2-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">If that fails look up the emergency services number by continent and country below:</b>
<ul>
<li><a href="#africa">Africa</a></li>
<li><a href="#asia">Asia and Oceania</a></li>
<li><a href="#europe">Europe</a></li>
<li><a href="#samer">Central and South America</a></li>
<li><a href="#mideast">Middle East</a></li>
<li>
<a href="#namer">North America and Caribbean</a><span id="africa"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="African_Emergency_Numbers_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>2</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="African_Emergency_Numbers">African Emergency Numbers</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_2">
<p class="lone_p"><i>Click these links to skip directly to <a href="#nafrica">Northern</a>, <a href="#eafrica">Eastern</a>, <a href="#cafrica">Central</a>, <a href="#wafrica">Western</a>, or <a href="#safrica">Southern</a> Africa.</i><span id="nafrica"></span></p>
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-3-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-3-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 3" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/32/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-3-Version-2.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-3-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_280e7c42c1" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_280e7c42c1')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 3" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/32/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-3-Version-2.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-3-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Northern Africa</font>.</b> These countries cover the Saharan desert and all African land north of it:

<ul>
<li>
<b>Algeria</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 021 – 23 63 81 <b>or</b> 021 – 71 14 14</li>
<li>Police: 17 (or 021 – 73 53 50 from a mobile)</li>
<li>Fire: 14 (or 021 – 71 14 14 from a mobile)</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Canary Islands</b>: 112</li>
<li>
<b>Egypt</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 123</li>
<li>Police: 122</li>
<li>Fire: 180</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Libya:</b> 193 <i>(currently unreliable)</i>
</li>
<li>
<b>Morocco:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance or Fire: 15</li>
<li>Police: 19</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Sudan:</b> Only local numbers available</li>
<li>
<b>Tunisia:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 190</li>
<li>Police: 197</li>
<li>Fire: 198<span id="eafrica"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-4-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-4-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 4" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d8/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-4-Version-2.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-4-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_c39d6db7ba" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_c39d6db7ba')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 4" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d8/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-4-Version-2.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-4-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Eastern Africa</font>.</b> Here are emergency numbers for the Horn of Africa, and countries along the eastern half of Africa, including Madagascar.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Burundi:</b> Only local numbers available</li>
<li>
<b>Djibouti</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 19</li>
<li>Police: 17</li>
<li>Fire: 18</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Eritrea</b>: Only local numbers available</li>
<li>
<b>Ethiopia:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 92</li>
<li>Police: 91</li>
<li>Fire: 93</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Kenya:</b>
<ul>
<li>All emergencies: 999</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Madagascar:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 124</li>
<li>Police: 117</li>
<li>Fire: 118</li>
<li>Traffic Accidents: 3600</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Malawi:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 998</li>
<li>Police: 997 <b>or</b> 990</li>
<li>Fire: 999</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Mauritius:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 114</li>
<li>Police: 112 <b>or</b> 999</li>
<li>Fire: 115 <b>or</b> 995</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Mozambique:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 117</li>
<li>Police: 119</li>
<li>Fire: 198</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Rwanda:</b>
<ul>
<li>
<b>Ambulance:</b> 912</li>
<li>
<b>Police and Fire:</b> 112</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Somalia:</b> <i>(may be unreliable or absent in some regions)</i><sup aria-label="Link to Reference 1" class="reference" id="_ref-1"><a href="#_note-1">[1]</a></sup><sup aria-label="Link to Reference 2" class="reference" id="_ref-2"><a href="#_note-2">[2]</a></sup><ul>
<li>Ambulance: 999</li>
<li>Police: 888</li>
<li>Fire: 555</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>South Sudan:</b>
<ul>
<li>Police: 777 <i>(in Juba only)</i><sup aria-label="Link to Reference 3" class="reference" id="_ref-3"><a href="#_note-3">[3]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Ambulance and Fire: Unavailable</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Tanzania:</b> <i>(may be unreliable; try <a class="external text" href="http://www.mydestination.com/tanzania/usefulinfo/6175433/emergency-numbers" rel="nofollow">local numbers</a>)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 115</li>
<li>Police: 112</li>
<li>Fire: 114</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Uganda:</b> 999</li>
<li>
<b>Zambia:</b> 999 <b>or</b> 991</li>
<li>
<b>Zimbabwe:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 994</li>
<li>Police: 777-777 <i>(leads to Harare Central Station)</i>
</li>
<li>Fire: 993 <b>or</b> 783-983</li>
<li>Medical Air Relief: 771-221<span id="cafrica"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-5.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-5.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 5" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/8b/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-5.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-5.jpg" height="546" id="img_d8fe2a4546" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_d8fe2a4546')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 5" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/8b/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-5.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-5.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Central Africa</font>.</b> Look here for information on countries in Central Africa, and on the central western coast. (See Western Africa below for countries along the northwest coast.)

<ul>
<li>
<b>Angola:</b><sup aria-label="Link to Reference 4" class="reference" id="_ref-4"><a href="#_note-4">[4]</a></sup><ul>
<li>Ambulance: 112</li>
<li>Police: 113</li>
<li>Fire: 115</li>
<li>If the numbers above don't work: Try the numbers for other services, 110 or 118. The disagreement among sources may reflect recent changes or variation throughout the country.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Cameroon</b>: <i>(available in major cities only)</i><sup aria-label="Link to Reference 5" class="reference" id="_ref-5"><a href="#_note-5">[5]</a></sup><ul>
<li>Ambulance: 112 (try this first) <b>or</b> 119</li>
<li>Police: 117</li>
<li>Fire: 118</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Central African Republic:</b> 117</li>
<li>
<b>Chad:</b> <i>(may be unreliable or unavailable in most of country)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: unavailable</li>
<li>Police: 17</li>
<li>Fire: 18</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Congo, Democratic Republic of the</b>: none available</li>
<li>
<b>Congo, Republic of the:</b> <i>(45 minute response times in Brazzaville, services almost nonexistent in rest of country)</i><sup aria-label="Link to Reference 6" class="reference" id="_ref-6"><a href="#_note-6">[6]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>All emergencies: 112 <b>or</b> +242 06 665-4804</li>
<li>
<b>Gabon:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 1300</li>
<li>Police: 177 (some regions), 01-76-55-85 (in Libreville), 07-36-22-25 (in Port Gentil)</li>
<li>Fire: 01-76-15-20 (in Libreville), 07-63-93-63 (in Port Gentil)<span id="wafrica"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-6.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-6.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 6" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9f/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-6.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-6.jpg" height="546" id="img_5ef506b8aa" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_5ef506b8aa')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 6" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9f/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-6.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-6.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Western Africa</font>.</b> This includes all sub-Saharan countries in the Western region of Africa. For countries along the southwestern coast (south of the "bend"), see Central Africa above or Southern Africa below.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Benin:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: Only local numbers available.</li>
<li>Police: 117</li>
<li>Fire: 118</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Burkina Faso:</b> 10-10</li>
<li>
<b>Gambia:</b> <i>(emergency response teams often low on resources)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 116</li>
<li>Police: 117 <i>or</i> (220) 422-4914</li>
<li>Fire: 118</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Ghana:</b> <i>(many regions may require local numbers)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 193 <b>or</b> 776111-5</li>
<li>Police: 191 <b>or</b> 999 <b>or</b> 171</li>
<li>Fire: 192</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Guinea:</b> Only local numbers available.</li>
<li>
<b>Guinea-Bisseau</b>: <i>(many regions may require local numbers)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 119</li>
<li>Police: 121</li>
<li>Fire: 180</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Ivory Coast:</b> 111</li>
<li>
<b>Liberia:</b> 911 <i>(very unreliable, and the country has no land-line telephones)</i>
</li>
<li>
<b>Mali:</b> <i>(many regions may require local numbers)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 15 <b>or</b> 112</li>
<li>Police: 17 <b>or</b> 18</li>
<li>Fire: 17 <b>or</b> 18 <b>or</b> 112</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Mauritania:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 118 <i>(Expect long delays; find alternate transport if possible)</i>
</li>
<li>Police: 117</li>
<li>Gendarmerie: 116 <i>(military law enforcement, for use outside cities)</i>
</li>
<li>Fire: 118</li>
<li>Traffic accidents: 117 <b>or</b> 119</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Niger:</b>
<ul>
<li>Police: 17 <b>or</b> +227-20-72-25-53 <i>(Unreliable, and only available during business hours)</i>
</li>
<li>Ambulance and Fire: Unavailable</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Nigeria:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance, Police and Fire (Outside Lagos): 199</li>
<li>Ambulance, Police and Fire (within Lagos): 112 or 767</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Senegal:</b>
<ul>
<li>Police: 33-821-2431 <b>or</b> 800-00-20-20 <b>or</b> 800-00-17-00</li>
<li>Tourist Police: (221) 33 860-3810</li>
<li>Ambulance and Fire: Unavailable</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Sierra Leone:</b> <i>(many regions may require local numbers)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance and Police: 999</li>
<li>Fire: 019</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Togo:</b> 117<span id="safrica"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-7.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-7.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 7" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/0f/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-7.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-7.jpg" height="546" id="img_84ce7979b7" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_84ce7979b7')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 7" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/0f/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-7.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-7.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Southern Africa</font>.</b> The following are emergency numbers for southern African countries:

<ul>
<li>
<b>Botswana:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 997</li>
<li>Police: 999</li>
<li>Fire: 998</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Lesotho:</b> <i>(may be unreliable)</i>
<ul>
<li>Police: (266) 2231 2934 <b>or</b> (266) 2232 2099</li>
<li>Other services: Only local numbers available</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Namibia:</b> 112</li>
<li>
<b>South Africa:</b> 10111</li>
<li>
<b>Swaziland:</b> 999<span id="asia"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
<div id="tocad_wrap">
<div class="wh_ad_inner step_ad" data-adsenseheight="90" data-adsensewidth="728" data-adtargetid="tocad" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-channels="6381149051,3492389196" data-lateload="1" data-loaded="0" data-service="adsense" data-slot="3356467874" data-viewablerefresh="1" id="tocad_outer"><div class="step_ad" id="tocad"></div></div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addTOCAd('tocad')</script>
</div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Asian_and_Oceania_Emergency_Numbers_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>3</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Asian_and_Oceania_Emergency_Numbers">Asian and Oceania Emergency Numbers</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_3">
<p class="lone_p"><i>Click these links to skip directly to <a href="#easia">East Asia</a>, <a href="#sasia">South Asia</a>, <a href="#seasia">Southeast Asia</a>, <a href="#casia">Central Asia</a>, or <a href="#oceania">Oceania</a>.</i><span id="easia"></span></p>
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-8.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-8.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 8" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9e/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-8.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-8.jpg" height="546" id="img_85e8a29767" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_85e8a29767')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 8" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9e/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-8.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-8.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in East Asia</font>.</b> This list includes China and surrounding countries in East Asia, including Japan.

<ul>
<li>
<b>China, mainland</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 120</li>
<li>Police: 110</li>
<li>Fire: 119</li>
<li>Traffic accidents: 122</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>China, Republic of</b>: See Taiwan</li>
<li>
<b>Hong Kong:</b> 999</li>
<li>
<b>Macau:</b> 999</li>
<li>
<b>Japan</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance or Fire: 119</li>
<li>Police: 110</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>North Korea</b>: May require local station number, but try 819, 112, or 119.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 7" class="reference" id="_ref-7"><a href="#_note-7">[7]</a></sup><sup aria-label="Link to Reference 8" class="reference" id="_ref-8"><a href="#_note-8">[8]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>
<b>Mongolia</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 103</li>
<li>Police: 102</li>
<li>Fire: 101</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>South Korea</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance or Fire: 119</li>
<li>Police: 112</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Taiwan</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance or Fire: 119</li>
<li>Police: 110<span id="sasia"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-9.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-9.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 9" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e5/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-9.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-9.jpg" height="546" id="img_ab4896b247" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_ab4896b247')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 9" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e5/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-9.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-9.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in South Asia</font>.</b> The following numbers cover countries in the Indian subcontinent.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Afghanistan</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 112 for Kabul (020-112 on a mobile phone). Outside of Kabul, local numbers only.</li>
<li>Police: 119 routes to Kabul, Kandahar, and Lashkar Gah. For local services elsewhere, you'll need a local number.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Bangladesh</b> <i>(may require local numbers outside of Dhaka and Chittagong)</i><sup aria-label="Link to Reference 9" class="reference" id="_ref-9"><a href="#_note-9">[9]</a></sup><sup aria-label="Link to Reference 10" class="reference" id="_ref-10"><a href="#_note-10">[10]</a></sup><ul>
<li>Ambulance: 199 <b>or</b> 9-555-555 <b>or</b> 9132023 <b>or</b> 8122041</li>
<li>Police: 999-2222 <b>or</b> 9551188 <b>or</b> 9514400 <b>or</b> 01713398311</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Bhutan</b><sup aria-label="Link to Reference 11" class="reference" id="_ref-11"><a href="#_note-11">[11]</a></sup><ul>
<li>Ambulance or Medical Advice: 112</li>
<li>Police: 113</li>
<li>Fire: 110</li>
<li>Traffic Accidents: 111</li>
<li>If none of the above work: Bhutan's emergency numbers are not consistently reported, possibly reflecting recent changes or variation throughout the country. If you can't get through, try the numbers listed for other services, or try 115.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>India</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 102</li>
<li>Police: 100</li>
<li>Fire: 101</li>
<li>Traffic Accidents: 103</li>
<li>All emergencies: 108 (only available in some regions)</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Maldives</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 102</li>
<li>Police: 119</li>
<li>Fire: 118 <b>or</b> 108 <b>or</b> 999</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Nepal</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 102 <i>(run by a non-profit in greater Kathmandu and Patan), 4228094 (Red Cross in Kathmandu)<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 12" class="reference" id="_ref-12"><a href="#_note-12">[12]</a></sup></i>
</li>
<li>Ambulance in other regions: Contact a <a class="external text" href="http://www.nepaltourism.info/nepalhotlink/emergencies_phones.html" rel="nofollow">local ambulance</a> or taxi.</li>
<li>Police: 100 or <a class="external text" href="http://www.nepalpolice.gov.np/emergency-number.html" rel="nofollow">a local station</a>
</li>
<li>Fire: 101</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Pakistan</b>:<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 13" class="reference" id="_ref-13"><a href="#_note-13">[13]</a></sup><ul>
<li>Ambulance: 115</li>
<li>Police: 15</li>
<li>Fire: 16</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Sri Lanka</b>:<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 14" class="reference" id="_ref-14"><a href="#_note-14">[14]</a></sup><i>(some regions may require local numbers)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance or Fire: 110 (<b>or</b> 011-2422222 in Colombo)</li>
<li>Police: 118 <b>or</b> 119 (<b>or</b> 011-2433333 in Colombo)</li>
<li>Tourist Police: 011-2421052<span id="seasia"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-10.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-10.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 10" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c1/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-10.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-10.jpg" height="546" id="img_8ee3b0c401" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_8ee3b0c401')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 10" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c1/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-10.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-10.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Southeast Asia</font>.</b> Refer to this list for all countries east of Bangladesh and South of China, as well as countries in the Malay peninsula.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Brunei</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 991 <b>or</b> 222366</li>
<li>Police: 993 <b>or</b> 423901</li>
<li>Fire: 995 <b>or</b> 222555</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Burma</b>: See Myanmar.</li>
<li>
<b>Cambodia</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 119</li>
<li>Police: 117</li>
<li>Fire: 118</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Indonesia:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 118 <b>or</b> 119</li>
<li>Police: 110 <b>or</b> 112</li>
<li>Fire: 113</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Laos:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 195</li>
<li>Police: 191</li>
<li>Fire: 190</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Malaysia:</b>
<ul>
<li>Police or Ambulance: 999</li>
<li>Fire: 999 or 994</li>
<li>Tourist police: 03 2149 6590</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Myanmar:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 192</li>
<li>Police: 199</li>
<li>Fire: 191</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>the Philippines:</b> 911</li>
<li>
<b>Singapore:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance or Fire: 995</li>
<li>Police: 999</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Thailand:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance or Police: 191</li>
<li>Fire: 199</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Vietnam:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 115</li>
<li>Police: 113</li>
<li>Fire: 114<span id="casia"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-11.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-11.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 11" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/46/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-11.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-11.jpg" height="546" id="img_18344050bc" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_18344050bc')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 11" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/46/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-11.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-11.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Central Asia</font>.</b> These countries are the landlocked countries in Central Asia. Note that Afghanistan is included in South Asia; Russia is included in Europe; and Mongolia is included in East Asia.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Kazakhstan:</b> <i>(may use 112, but will likely be directed to call one of the following)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 103</li>
<li>Police: 102</li>
<li>Fire: 101</li>
<li>Gas Leak: 104</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Kyrgyzstan:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 103</li>
<li>Police: 102</li>
<li>Fire: 101</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Tajikistan:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 03</li>
<li>Police: 02</li>
<li>Fire: 01</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Turkmenistan:</b> 03</li>
<li>
<b>Uzbekistan:</b> <i>(Add an initial 1 while in Tashkent city)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 03</li>
<li>Police: 02</li>
<li>Fire: 01<span id="oceania"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-12.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-12.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 12" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/59/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-12.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-12.jpg" height="546" id="img_90e56eabc2" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_90e56eabc2')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 12" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/59/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-12.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-12.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Oceania</font>.</b> This includes Australia and Pacific island nations. Note that Oceania nations with populations below 800,000 are not included.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Australia</b>: 000</li>
<li>
<b>Fiji</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance and Fire: 911</li>
<li>Police: 917</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>New Zealand</b>: 111<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 15" class="reference" id="_ref-15"><a href="#_note-15">[15]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>
<b>Papua New Guinea</b>: 111<span id="europe"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="European_Emergency_Numbers_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>4</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="European_Emergency_Numbers">European Emergency Numbers</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_4">
<p class="lone_p"><i>The number 112 works in most of Europe. To see the exceptions in each region, click these links for <a href="#seeurope">Southeastern Europe</a>, <a href="#eeurope">Eastern Europe</a>, and <a href="#weurope">Northern, Central, and Western Europe</a>.</i></p>
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-13.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-13.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 13" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6b/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-13.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-13.jpg" height="546" id="img_f28c0c4463" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_f28c0c4463')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 13" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6b/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-13.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-13.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call 112 in most countries.</font></b> Most European countries use 112 as the all-purpose emergency number, including every country in the European Union. Only countries that do not have the 112 number are listed below.

<ul>
<li>Many countries have additional, country-specific emergency numbers, but 112 will direct you to the same services.<span id="seeurope"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-14.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-14.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 14" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/67/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-14.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-14.jpg" height="546" id="img_14770f101f" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_14770f101f')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 14" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/67/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-14.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-14.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Southeastern Europe</font>.</b> Most countries here use 112, or are too small for inclusion on this list (less than one million people). Here are the larger exceptions:

<ul>
<li>
<b>Albania:</b> 129 <i>(emergency services are unreliable)</i>
</li>
<li>
<b>Bosnia and Herzegovina:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 124</li>
<li>Police: 122</li>
<li>Fire: 123</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Macedonia:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 194</li>
<li>Police: 192</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Serbia:</b> <i>(include the local area code if dialing from a mobile phone)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 194</li>
<li>Police: 192</li>
<li>Fire: 193</li>
<li>Roadside assistance: 1987</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Turkey:</b>
<ul>
<li>All emergencies (including ambulance): 155</li>
<li>Ambulance only: 112<span id="eeurope"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-15.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-15.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 15" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/95/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-15.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-15.jpg" height="546" id="img_a55a0d1cab" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_a55a0d1cab')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 15" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/95/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-15.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-15.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Eastern Europe</font>.</b> This includes former members of the Soviet Union and surrounding Slavic states. All states not listed below either use the number 112 or contain fewer than one million people.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Belarus:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 103</li>
<li>Police: 102</li>
<li>Fire: 101</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Moldova:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 903</li>
<li>Police: 902</li>
<li>Fire: 901</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Russia:</b>
<ul>
<li>Fire: 01 <b>or</b> 101</li>
<li>Police: 02 <b>or</b> 102</li>
<li>Ambulance: 03 <b>or</b> 103</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Ukraine:</b> <i>(expect long delays and poor service)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 103</li>
<li>Police: 102</li>
<li>Fire: 101<span id="weurope"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-16.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-16.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 16" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b6/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-16.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-16.jpg" height="546" id="img_3e176a1f77" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_3e176a1f77')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 16" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b6/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-16.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-16.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Northern, Central, or Western Europe</font>.</b> Almost all states in this region use the number 112 for all emergency services, although they may have alternate numbers that lead to the same result. Here are the only exceptions that affect more than one million people:

<ul>
<li>
<b>Norway:</b>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 113</li>
<li>Police: 112</li>
<li>Fire: 110</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Switzerland:</b>
<ul>
<li>General: 112</li>
<li>Ambulance: 144</li>
<li>Police: 117</li>
<li>Fire: 118</li>
<li>Toxic: 145 (You may want to call Ambulance first)</li>
<li>Air Ambulance (REGA): 1414</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>UK:999</b><span id="samer"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Central_and_South_American_Emergency_Numbers_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>5</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Central_and_South_American_Emergency_Numbers">Central and South American Emergency Numbers</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_5">
<p class="lone_p"><i>Click these links to skip directly to <a href="#central">Central</a> or <a href="#southamer">South America</a>.<span id="central"></span></i></p>
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-17.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-17.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 17" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/02/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-17.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-17.jpg" height="546" id="img_d0f4ab3794" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_d0f4ab3794')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 17" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/02/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-17.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-17.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_5_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in Central America</font>.</b> The following list includes all countries in the mainland of North America and south of Mexico, with a population greater than one million people.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Costa Rica</b>: 911</li>
<li>
<b>El Salvador</b>: 911</li>
<li>
<b>Guatemala</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance or Fire: 123 <b>or</b> 122</li>
<li>Police: 110 <b>or</b> 120</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Honduras</b>: <i>(telephone service may be unreliable)</i>
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 195 (Red Cross)</li>
<li>Police: 911 <b>or</b> 112</li>
<li>Fire: 198</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Nicaragua</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 128</li>
<li>Police: 118 (Spanish) <b>or</b> 101 (English tourism services)</li>
<li>Fire: 115 <b>or</b> 911</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Panama</b>:
<ul>
<li>All emergencies: 911</li>
<li>Direct to police: 104<span id="southamer"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-18.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-18.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 18" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3a/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-18.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-18.jpg" height="546" id="img_f0080c7406" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_f0080c7406')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 18" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3a/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-18.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-18.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_5_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in South America.</font></b> Here are emergency services for all countries with more than one million people on the South American continent.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Argentina</b>:
<ul>
<li>Cordoba, Mendoza, Iguazu, Tucuman, and Tierra del Fuego provinces: 101</li>
<li>All other provinces: 911</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Bolivia</b>: 110</li>
<li>
<b>Brazil</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 192</li>
<li>Police: 190</li>
<li>Fire: 193</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Chile</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 131</li>
<li>Police: 133</li>
<li>Fire: 132</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Colombia</b>: 123</li>
<li>
<b>Ecuador</b>:
<ul>
<li>Quito and Ibarra: 911</li>
<li>Guayaquil, Cuenca and Loja,: 112</li>
<li>Elsewhere, Ambulance: 102 (or 131 for Red Cross)</li>
<li>Elsewhere, Police: 101</li>
<li>Elsewhere, Fire: 102</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Paraguay</b>:
<ul>
<li>All emergencies: 911</li>
<li>Direct to Fire or Rescue: 131 <b>or</b> 132</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Peru</b>:
<ul>
<li>Police: 105<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 16" class="reference" id="_ref-16"><a href="#_note-16">[16]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Fire: 116<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 17" class="reference" id="_ref-17"><a href="#_note-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Alternatives: Try 011 <b>or</b> 5114<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 18" class="reference" id="_ref-18"><a href="#_note-18">[18]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Tourist Protection: <sup aria-label="Link to Reference 19" class="reference" id="_ref-19"><a href="#_note-19">[19]</a></sup> 424 2053 (add initial area code 01 if outside of Lima)</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Uruguay</b>: 911</li>
<li>
<b>Venezuela</b>: 171<span id="mideast"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Middle_Eastern_Emergency_Numbers_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>6</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Middle_Eastern_Emergency_Numbers">Middle Eastern Emergency Numbers</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_6">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-19.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-19.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 19" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/99/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-19.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-19.jpg" height="546" id="img_c47d144575" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_c47d144575')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 19" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/99/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-19.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-19.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_6_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in the Middle East.</font></b> This includes all countries in the Arabian peninsula and some surrounding countries. For Egypt, see Northern Africa. For Turkey, see Southeastern Europe.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Bahrain</b>: 999</li>
<li>
<b>Iran</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 115</li>
<li>Police: 110</li>
<li>Fire: 125</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Iraq</b>: 130 <i>(including mobile telephones)</i>
</li>
<li>
<b>Israel</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 101</li>
<li>Police: 100</li>
<li>Fire: 102</li>
<li><i>(The West Bank and Gaza use the same numbers)</i></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Jordan</b>:
<ul>
<li>All emergencies: 191</li>
<li>Alternate number, some parts of Amman: 911</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Kuwait</b>: 112</li>
<li>
<b>Lebanon</b>: 112</li>
<li>
<b>Oman</b>: 9999</li>
<li>
<b>Palestine</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 101</li>
<li>Police: 100</li>
<li>Fire: 102</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Qatar</b>: 999</li>
<li>
<b>Saudi Arabia</b>: 999</li>
<li>
<b>Syria</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 110</li>
<li>Police: 112</li>
<li>Fire: 113</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>United Arab Emirates</b>: 999</li>
<li>
<b>Yemen</b>: 199<span id="namer"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="North_American_and_Caribbean_Emergency_Numbers_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>7</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="North_American_and_Caribbean_Emergency_Numbers">North American and Caribbean Emergency Numbers</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_7">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9d/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_9a73155fe4" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_9a73155fe4')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9d/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-1-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_7_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call 911 in most of North America</font>.</b> 911 is used by any country part of the North America Numbering Plan (NANP), including the United States, Canada, Bermuda, Puerto Rico, US Virgin Islands, Northern Marianas, Guam, American Samoa, and Sint Maarten.

<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 20" class="reference" id="_ref-20"><a href="#_note-20">[20]</a></sup>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-20.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-20.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 20" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c1/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-20.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-20.jpg" height="546" id="img_76ff483913" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_76ff483913')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 20" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c1/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-20.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-20.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_7_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in North America</font>.</b> Note that mainland countries south of Mexico are listed under Central America.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Canada:</b> 911</li>
<li>
<b>Mexico:</b> 066</li>
<li>
<b>United States:</b> 911</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage final_li">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-21.jpg?ajax=true&aid=542770" href="#/Image:Call-Emergency-Services-Step-21.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 21" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2b/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-21.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-21.jpg" height="546" id="img_a17cff6391" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_a17cff6391')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Call Emergency Services Step 21" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2b/Call-Emergency-Services-Step-21.jpg/aid542770-v4-728px-Call-Emergency-Services-Step-21.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_7_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><font size="5">Call in the Caribbean</font>.</b> All Caribbean nations with more than 350,000 people are listed here. Note that Martinique, Guadalupe, and several other islands are part of the French West Indies.

<ul>
<li>
<b>Cuba</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 114 <i>or</i> 118<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 21" class="reference" id="_ref-21"><a href="#_note-21">[21]</a></sup>(Expect long delays and poor service.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 22" class="reference" id="_ref-22"><a href="#_note-22">[22]</a></sup> Most high-quality services use local numbers, may treat foreigners only, and may require payment in advance)</li>
<li>Police: 106</li>
<li>Fire: 105</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Dominican Republic</b>: 911</li>
<li>
<b>French West Indies</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 15</li>
<li>Police: 18</li>
<li>Fire: 17</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<b>Haiti</b>: 114</li>
<li>
<b>Jamaica</b>: 119</li>
<li>
<b>Puerto Rico</b>: 911</li>
<li>
<b>Trinidad and Tobago</b>:
<ul>
<li>Ambulance: 990 <b>or</b> 811 (or 694-2404 for private ambulance service)</li>
<li>Police: 999</li>
<li>Fire: 990</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Questions_and_Answers_sub"></a>
<div class="qa section sticky qa_show_unanswered_questions" data-aid="542770" data-few_contribs="1" data-search_enabled="0">
<h2>
<div class="altblock"></div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="qa_headline">Community Q&A</span>
</h2>
<div class="section_text" id="qa">
<div id="qa_answered_questions_container">
<div id="qa_aq_search_container">
<div class="qa_section_heading" id="qa_aq_search_heading">Search</div>
<input class="qa_aq_search" placeholder="Type your query here"/>
</div>
<a id="qa_add_curated_question">Add New Question</a>
<ul class="qa_questions qa_aqs qa_waittheresmore" id="qa_article_questions">
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="91938" data-caid="92811" data-cqid="91955" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="710622" data-submitter_id="3547322" data-verifier_id="105181" data-votes_down="3" data-votes_up="19">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">If I were to hang up on a landline phone several times quickly, will it call the police?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_expert_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box">
<a class="sp_namelink qa_person_circle" href="/Special:ArticleReviewers?name=jonasdemuro%2Cmd#jonasdemuro%2Cmd" style="background-image: url(/images/thumb/3/38/Jonas-DeMuro.jpg/-crop-200-200-200px-Jonas-DeMuro.jpg)" target="_blank">
</a>
<div class="qa_expert_name">
<a class="sp_namelink" href="/Special:ArticleReviewers?name=jonasdemuro%2Cmd#jonasdemuro%2Cmd" target="_blank">Jonas DeMuro, MD</a><br/>
	Critical Care Surgeon
</div>
Dr. DeMuro is a Board Certified Pediatric Critical Care Surgeon in New York. He received his MD from Stony Brook University School of Medicine in 1996.
</div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<a class="sp_namelink qa_person_circle" href="/Special:ArticleReviewers?name=jonasdemuro%2Cmd#jonasdemuro%2Cmd" style="background-image: url(/images/thumb/3/38/Jonas-DeMuro.jpg/-crop-200-200-200px-Jonas-DeMuro.jpg)" target="_blank">
</a>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name">
<a href="/Special:ArticleReviewers?name=jonasdemuro%2Cmd#jonasdemuro%2Cmd" target="_blank">Jonas DeMuro, MD</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_user_title">Critical Care Surgeon</div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Expert Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">No, hanging up will not activate the police. It is best to call 911 (or your country's equivalent), and to speak to the emergency operator and indicate what type of help is needed.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>3</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>19</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="240427" data-caid="241300" data-cqid="240444" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1562868" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="2" data-votes_up="18">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">If I need to call the police and it is not safe to speak in that situation, what should I do?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">You should put the phone right next to you, as the operator will probably realize that you are in a situation where you cannot speak, track your location, and send police/ambulance/fire as quickly as possible.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>2</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>18</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="442095" data-caid="442968" data-cqid="442112" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="2428293" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="1" data-votes_up="7">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">I accidentally dialed 911 twice in a short span of time. Will I be in legal trouble?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">No, you won't be in legal trouble.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>1</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>7</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="350806" data-caid="351679" data-cqid="350823" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1764484" data-submitter_id="1299883" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="1" data-votes_up="5">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">Can I remain anonymous while calling 911 to report a suicidal person?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_ta_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle" style="background-image:url(https://www.wikihow.com/images/avatarOut/c/cf/1299883.jpg?20170812163335)"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"><span class="qa_user_link" data-href="/User:Eric">Eric</span></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Top Answerer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">You can request to remain anonymous when calling 911. You may be asked to provide your name to the operator, but you can remain anonymous to the suicidal person. They will not reveal who called.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>1</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>5</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="226984" data-caid="227857" data-cqid="227001" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1105513" data-submitter_id="4159629" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="4" data-votes_up="9">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">I suffer from panic attacks and become convinced I'm having a heart attack. I keep calling the emergency services. How do I stop this knee-jerk reaction?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle" style="background-image:url(https://www.wikihow.com/skins/WikiHow/images/80x80_user.png)"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"><span class="qa_user_link" data-href="/User:ThomasM10">ThomasM10</span></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">Keep calm and relax. Having a heart attack, while a possibility, is unlikely, especially if you're young. You may want to check out other articles on wikiHow about how to properly cope with stress and panic attacks. I am sure you will find some relevant things. A heart attack may be preceded by a really powerful chest pain and pain going down your forearm and arm. These are usually not present in panic attacks. 911 calls are not necessary in that situation, however, if one day you really think with certainty that you are having a heart attack then you must call 911 immediately.
You should have a look at some stress-relieving methods.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">

<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="273691" data-caid="274564" data-cqid="273708" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1740969" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="5" data-votes_up="9">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">I need help, but I feel like calling 911 is too extreme when it's only me that's in trouble. Is that bad? Do you think 911 would mind if I called? </div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">If it is life threatening and you are in need of protective services or medical help call 911 right away. If you need emotional help, call a suicide help line.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">

</div>

<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="356751" data-caid="357624" data-cqid="356768" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1664490" data-submitter_id="4486703" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="5" data-votes_up="6">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">If I'm in another country and a friend in America has an emergency. How would I handle this? I could just call the non emergency number for their area, but is there a faster way?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle" style="background-image:url(https://www.wikihow.com/images/avatarOut/c/c7/4486703.jpg?20190322190613)"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"><span class="qa_user_link" data-href="/User:Awesome-Aasim">Aasim Syed</span></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">The friend has to call the emergency number themselves, unless someone else nearby can call. Want to call the emergency services fast? Follow these steps <a href="#SOS">here</a>.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">

<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="442104" data-caid="442977" data-cqid="442121" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="2401342" data-submitter_id="4486703" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="1" data-votes_up="2">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">What number can I call if I'm in Australia?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle" style="background-image:url(https://www.wikihow.com/images/avatarOut/c/c7/4486703.jpg?20190322190613)"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"><span class="qa_user_link" data-href="/User:Awesome-Aasim">Aasim Syed</span></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">In Australia, you can dial 000. You can also call 911 or 112 from GSM phones. If you are hard of hearing, dial 066.</div>

<div class="section tips sticky">
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Tips">Tips</span></h2>
<div class="section_text" id="tips">
<ul>
<li>Note that in some countries, there is no national emergency telephone number. In those cases, you need to contact local services directly. This may be the case if the country is not listed here.</li>
<li>When traveling abroad, do not assume that emergency services in your language will be available. Always have an interpreter on hand or reachable by phone.</li>
<li>In many European and African countries, 116 or 116-1111 is a child help-line for children who need help, or for reporting missing children.</li>
<li>Knowing <a href="/Communicate-During-an-Emergency" title="Communicate During an Emergency">how to communicate during an emergency</a> might be important if you are worried about how to contact emergency services over a more extended event (like a major earthquake or flood).</li>
</ul>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section warnings sticky">
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Warnings">Warnings</span></h2>
<div class="section_text" id="warnings">
<ul>
<li>In many countries, a silent emergency call may not get a response. The more background noise there is, and the more suspicious it sounds, the better your chances of a response.</li>
<li>Do not use these numbers for anything other than legitimate emergencies. Doing so risks the lives of people who need emergency help, wastes community resources and may subject you to criminal prosecution. When in doubt, make the emergency call, and the emergency services will transfer you to the non emergency number should the situation described is not an emergency.</li>
</ul>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
